name: basic ribbed socks
notes:
*from pattern notes:*

> "i love to solve problems... and to knit. this sock design was developed as a solution to two irksome issues: socks with a plain stocking-stitch leg tend to fall down, and i find k1p1 ribbing tedious.
> and so,the basic ribbed sock was born." 

pattern is available in several places:
* [archived spun magazine][1]
* kate atherley knits blog - [by popular demand: basic ribbed sock][2] with [notes for resizing also available][3].


  [1]: http://web.archive.org/web/20070501102919/http://spunmag.com/article/060421socks
  [2]: http://kateatherley.blogspot.com/2007/12/by-popular-demand-basic-ribbed-sock.html
  [3]: http://kateatherley.blogspot.com/2008/02/resizing-basic-ribbed-sock.html
